en.description: To evaluate the performance of catalyst.

features.name: Standard
features.description: Includes standard features like configure sections, charts and post comments.

operations.name: View
operations.description: Allow to view trendline, datasets and plant settings, But can not update or add any new datasets.

operations.name: Export
operations.description: Allow to export reports and chart images.

operations.name: Update Charts And Sections Configuration
operations.description: Allow to update the configuration settings of charts and sections.
